tool_description: Validates parking space compliance by comparing provided parking against zoning requirements based on property use type and size.

property_use.description: Primary use type of the property

employee_count.description: Number of employees if commercial use

dwelling_units.description: Number of dwelling units if residential

error_messages: Invalid use type: Property use type not recognized for parking calculations.
Invalid measurements: Building area must be positive, available spaces cannot be negative.
Missing data for calculation: Insufficient information to calculate parking requirements for this use type.
Inconsistent data: Employee or unit counts seem inconsistent with building area.
usage: Provide property use, building area, and available parking spaces. Include employee count or dwelling units as applicable for accurate requirement calculation.

required_spaces.description: Number of parking spaces required by zoning

space_deficit.description: Number of spaces short of requirement (if any)

calculation_basis.description: Basis used for parking requirement calculation
